name: Crabby (Miziziziz Game Jam)
description:
Left      =     a , ⇦

Right     =     d , ⇨

Jump      =     space      (hold for higher jump)

(or alternatively a controller should *in theory*  work)

My first game jam game. You play as a crab rescuing his kinky girlfriend and killing a few pesky squids on the journey. Short and sweet platformer.

*edit*  Fixed getting stuck on walls and the dialogue should all play through now :)
